com.meterware.simplestub

Class Stub

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.meterware.simplestub.Stub

  • public abstract class Stub
extends Object
    This class allows for the instantiation of auto-generated simple stubs from abstract classes, optionally annotated with the @SimpleStub annotation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Stub()

      Instantiates a stub from an abstract class.
      static <T> T createStub(Class<T> aClass, Object... parameters)
      Instantiates a stub from an abstract class or interface, generated implementations of any abstract methods.

    • Method Detail

      • createStub

        public static <T> T createStub(Class<T> aClass,
               Object... parameters)
        Instantiates a stub from an abstract class or interface, generated implementations of any abstract methods. By default, any abstract methods will do nothing, returning a zero, false, or null value; however, if the class is annotated with @SimpleStub and the strict parameter is set true, generated methods will throw an exception.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the abstract class
        Parameters:
        aClass - the class from which a stub should be generated.
        parameters - any parameters needed for the constructor. If the class is an inner class, the first parameter must be the outer class instance.
        Returns:
        a newly instantiated stub

      • createStrictStub

        public static <T> T createStrictStub(Class<T> aClass,
                     Object... parameters)
        Instantiates a stub from an abstract class. Any abstract methods will throw an exception.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the abstract class
        Parameters:
        aClass - the class from which a stub should be generated.
        parameters - any parameters needed for the constructor. If the class is an inner class, the first parameter must be the outer class instance.
        Returns:
        a newly instantiated stub

      • create

        public static <T> T create(Class<T> aClass,
           Object... parameters)
        Deprecated. use #createStub
        Instantiates a stub from an abstract class
